
Changelog for django-sphinxdoc
==============================

v0.3 – 1010-01-06:
------------------

- [NEW] Views for images, sources and object inventory


v0.2 – 2009-12-30:
------------------

- [NEW] Documentation, general index and module index work
- [NEW] Basic documentation written


v0.1 – 2009-12-19:
------------------

- [NEW] Initial release
